name: Crescent
blurb: Conquer the elements in a strategy grid-based game in which unit choice can help to achieve your goal of enemy capture.

rewards.reward: You will receive an email personally thanking you for your contribution.
You will receive an email personally thanking you for your contribution and a custom wood burned playing piece of an element initialed by the artist and receive an iOS copy of Crescent.

You will receive an email personally thanking you for your contribution, a custom wood burned playing piece of an element initialed by the artist, a metal keychain with a laser etched Crescent logo and receive an iOS copy of Crescent.

You will receive an email personally thanking you for your contribution, a custom wood burned playing piece of an element initialed by the artist, will be listed as a Supporter in the game credits and receive an iOS copy of Crescent.

You will receive an email personally thanking you for your contribution, a custom wood burned playing piece of an element initialed by the artist, a baseball hat with the Crescent logo, one autographed wood burned game board along with wood burned playing pieces, a baseball hat with the Crescent logo, a t-shirt with the Crescent logo, 2 metal keychains with laster etched Crescent logo, listed as a Supporter, have a special thank you in the game credits, and receive an iOS copy of Crescent.

You will receive an original prototype game board featured on our Kickstarter page along with the original game pieces.
